Package commands

Class CommandController

  • java.lang.Object
    • commands.CommandController
  • public class CommandController
extends java.lang.Object
    controls execution of all commands

      • invoke

        public boolean invoke​(CommandInfo command,
                      java.lang.String[] args)
               throws java.io.IOException,
                      java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Send extra info to server (if it needs)
        Parameters:
        command - that need to execute
        args - of this command
        Returns:
        true if invoke is successfully done; false if execution has got troubles
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if request couldn't receive or send
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if request couldn't deserialize
